  • Constructor Details

    • PaintController

      public PaintController()
      Constructs a new PaintController instance and initializes the core components of the paint application, including the model, view, and various event handlers.

      This constructor sets up the user interface, event listeners, and drawing functionality, creates a blank canvas with a default size of 800x600 pixels, and starts the auto-save timer.

      See Also:
      • setupMenu()
      • setupWindowListener()
      • setupMouseDrawing()
      • createBlankImage(int, int)
      • setupAutoSaveTimer()

  • Method Details

    • getView

      public PaintView getView()

    • getFileExtension

      public String getFileExtension(File file)
      Returns the file extension of the given file.

      The extension is defined as the substring after the last dot ('.') in the file name. The returned extension is converted to lowercase. If the file name has no extension, an empty string is returned.

      Parameters:
      file - the file whose extension is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the lowercase file extension, or an empty string if none exists

    • zoomIn

      public void zoomIn()
      zooms into to panel

    • clickedCtrlV

      public void clickedCtrlV()
      Handles the paste action (Ctrl+V) by inserting the image stored in the model's clipboard.

      If a clipboard image exists, it is set as the current selection image and a paste preview is activated. The image is initially positioned at the center of the image panel, and the view is repainted to reflect the pending paste operation.

      If the clipboard is empty or does not contain an image, a message is printed to the console.
